entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:44 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 06:44 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
